uk.co.strangeskies.p2

Interface P2Repository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    aQute.bnd.service.Plugin, aQute.bnd.service.RemoteRepositoryPlugin, org.osgi.service.repository.Repository, aQute.bnd.service.RepositoryPlugin

    public interface P2Repository
extends aQute.bnd.service.RemoteRepositoryPlugin, org.osgi.service.repository.Repository, aQute.bnd.service.Plugin
    A wrapper for an Eclipse p2 repository.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface aQute.bnd.service.RepositoryPlugin

        aQute.bnd.service.RepositoryPlugin.DownloadListener, aQute.bnd.service.RepositoryPlugin.PutOptions, aQute.bnd.service.RepositoryPlugin.PutResult

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ARTIFACT_LOCATION_PROPERTY
      Property for repository artifact location, to be used alongside the METADATA_LOCATION_PROPERTY property.
      static String CACHE_DIRECTORY_PROPERTY
      Property for cache location, with a default given by DEFAULT_CACHE_DIRECTORY in the user's home directory.
      static String CACHE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS_PROPERTY
      The length of time in seconds that cached artifact downloads will be retained and remain valid.
      static String DEFAULT_CACHE_DIRECTORY
      Default location for offline caching of repository artifacts.
      static int DEFAULT_CACHE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
      Default cache timeout in seconds.
      static String LOCATION_PROPERTY
      Property key for repository location.
      static String METADATA_LOCATION_PROPERTY
      Property for repository metadata location, to be used alongside the ARTIFACT_LOCATION_PROPERTY property.
      static String NAME_PROPERTY
      Property key for repository name.

    • Field Detail

      • NAME_PROPERTY

        static final String NAME_PROPERTY
        Property key for repository name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOCATION_PROPERTY

        static final String LOCATION_PROPERTY
        Property key for repository location. Setting this property to a value is equivalent to setting both the METADATA_LOCATION_PROPERTY and ARTIFACT_LOCATION_PROPERTY to that value. This property should therefore not be used in conjunction with those properties.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • METADATA_LOCATION_PROPERTY

        static final String METADATA_LOCATION_PROPERTY
        Property for repository metadata location, to be used alongside the ARTIFACT_LOCATION_PROPERTY property. Typically, this may be the same as the artifact location, and so LOCATION_PROPERTY may be used instead.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ARTIFACT_LOCATION_PROPERTY

        static final String ARTIFACT_LOCATION_PROPERTY
        Property for repository artifact location, to be used alongside the METADATA_LOCATION_PROPERTY property. Typically, this may be the same as the metadata location, and so LOCATION_PROPERTY may be used instead.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CACHE_DIRECTORY_PROPERTY

        static final String CACHE_DIRECTORY_PROPERTY
        Property for cache location, with a default given by DEFAULT_CACHE_DIRECTORY in the user's home directory.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_CACHE_DIRECTORY

        static final String DEFAULT_CACHE_DIRECTORY
        Default location for offline caching of repository artifacts.

      • CACHE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS_PROPERTY

        static final String CACHE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS_PROPERTY
        The length of time in seconds that cached artifact downloads will be retained and remain valid. Defaults to 30 seconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_CACHE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS

        static final int DEFAULT_CACHE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS
        Default cache timeout in seconds.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
